website_summaries.verdict: We love the look (and feel and smell) of this real-leather case that cleverly disguises your laptop as a vintage book.
pros: A sophisticated, attractive hand-crafted carrying case
Rigid spine, reinforced corners and hardback “book” covers provide excellent impact absorption
Comes with hidden pocket for papers and documents
cons: Not for anyone who wants bright colors

customer_reviews.title: Protection and Great Look
customer_reviews.text: Great look and great protection. Considering the amount of time I use my laptop I wanted to find a case with thick protection and a great look. One of the best things is that because the case looks so great I oftentimes close my laptop just for the look instead of leaving it open and allowing it to sleep like I did before without a case. And I have noticed a significant decrease in getting anything on my screen or keyboard. It really has helped prevent my MacBook from looking older or messy. Great fit too!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Zipper Broke After Only Two Months
customer_reviews.text: Very stylish looking case, but the zipper completely broke within 2 months of use. For the amount of money it sells for, I would expect a more durable product. It's not like I was particularly hard on the zipper. It just completely ripped off while I was opening it one day. Otherwise, it's a great looking case and protects the laptop well. Is this a known issue? Is there any recourse from the seller at this point? I purchased it in August and began using it in September. Two months later, the zipper is dead and I can't close is securely.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Renshaw

customer_reviews.title: These cases are awesome! I bought one for my wife's 13" non-retina ...
customer_reviews.text: These cases are awesome! I bought one for my wife's 13" non-retina MBP and I have one for my 15" non-retina MBP. I love to open these up and smell the leather and the look is amazing. I carry mine into work all the time and it is disregarded as a large book. Occasionally someone will compliment the beauty of the "book" to which I tell them it is my computer case. The inside is soft and velvet and will protect the finish whereas the functionality is great in that I never have had any over heating issues that are sometimes problematic on some cases. The case is a bit pricey, but it is a premium look and premium quality.
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: I saw a friend who had this and I loved the design so I ordered one
customer_reviews.text: I'd give it a 5 for Macbook Air and not only is it attractive but fits snugly. I saw a friend who had this and I loved the design so I ordered one. Unfortunately, it does not fit a 13 in Macbook Pro perfectly. The top of my screen barely makes it to the corner fasteners so the laptop is not held in place when open. I gave it as a Christmas gift. Annoyingly somehow this was in my shopping basket, and a recent purchase made me reorder this item again, and I tried once again to fit it....because it is that cute but no go which prompted me to write this review. :-(
customer_reviews.author: wanderlust2go

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice. Zip broke after a few weeks. Not easy to exchange
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Am giving it 3 stars because this is the second case I’ve ordered and the zip has broken. I contacted manufacturer’s support and they don’t make it easy to replace unless it was purchased directly from them. Silly considering it’s their product. And now who has time to chase around trying to return something so I don’t use it anymore. Company should make replacing it more easy because the product almost sells itself ( I travel a lot and everywhere I go people always asked me where to buy the case - I must have sent dozens of people to twelve south to purchase their covers).
customer_reviews.author: GOLDIE

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny. Very high Quality
customer_reviews.text: This was a very expensive MacBook case as far as I’m concerned. However it was absolutely worth it. My MacBook got in perfectly and the quality was outstanding. It is really a beautiful cover and has withstood the tests of time as it’s been a few years since purchasing. The book end is very realistic and when placed on my shelf it blends right in with the surrounding books making for a really nice aesthetic
customer_reviews.author: Hallelujah Jaffar

customer_reviews.title: Simply delighted with my Vintage Brown BookBook MacBook Air case!
customer_reviews.text: The photo of the product shows Vintage Brown, but the specifications show it as the Rutledge Edition (different leather and color tone). There doesn't appear to be a way to select a color choice. I ordered it anyway, figuring I would just deal with whichever case arrived (I liked both). I was happy to see that the Vintage Brown case was what came in the mail (it got higher reviews and it matches the BookBook phone case I have as well). Very nicely made, fits well, zipper works with no difficulties. And the best part....it was $20 cheaper on Amazon than it is on the TwelveSouth website! I do love a deal!
customer_reviews.author: J. Groeschen

customer_reviews.title: Bookbook
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent concept and does work well as a “deterrent” but only from the front view. It does hold the heat from the fan of my computer and when using long periods of time I have to pull it from the case to cool down
customer_reviews.author: Jaycoub

customer_reviews.title: Go ahead and splurge
customer_reviews.text: I get so many compliments on this - everyone thinks it's a book. It provides great protection, pretty unbeatable, and the wear increases the antique look to it. I used it for over half a year. The downside is it's heavy - though it is essentially a cover and case in one, so you can just put it straight in your bag and go. I ended up buying a snap on case and laptop bag, but am keeping my BookBook because I'll probably use it again in the future. It is bulky, and quite expensive. But if you want it I recommend saving up your money and splurging on this.
customer_reviews.author: LaDawn O.

customer_reviews.title: Not a snug case... it's a carrying case.  Choose wisely which you want to use it for.
customer_reviews.text: This is from other reviews that I wish I had read: My BIGGEST disappointment with this case is the elastic loops in the top corners of the lid where the monitor goes. It barely even holds it right and is constantly slipping down. So essentially they are pretty much useless. Unfortunately, it does not fit a 13 in Macbook Pro perfectly. The top of my screen barely makes it to the corner fasteners so the laptop is not held in place when open. So, basically the computer can be placed in the case, zipped and it can be used as a carrying case. But the Macbook Pro does not stay in place when the computer is open.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Tischler

customer_reviews.title: I get daily compliments on my laptop case.
customer_reviews.text: I've goten so many compliments on this. I live in a pretty high crime area and this really does disguise what would be a pretty easy smash and grab. MY MB Air stays in it all the time. The Pros: Looks stunning Fits perfect Great protection The Cons: The leather does scratch easily. This is supposed to aid the "vintage" look but I like it unscratched. The straps for the top of the laptop cold be more durable. They seem to be getting a little "stretched" after about a year of use. The price. Yeah. It is high. Wold I buy it again? I would. Without blinking.
customer_reviews.author: DWC

customer_reviews.title: Scratches very easily and won't hold the laptop properly.
customer_reviews.text: These covers are beautiful but not worth the money, they scratch very easily and won't hold the laptop properly
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous, but...
customer_reviews.text: I don't have much new to add to what's been said here, but I will reiterate: it's gorgeous, it's extremely cool, but if you bought an Air because of the weight, the weight of this thing pretty much negates that, and yes: the zipper is pretty flimsy, and sticks a lot. I'm going to be most unhappy if it doesn't hold up. And oh yes, the last one: the two flimsy elastic pieces to hold it in the case are just that: flimsy. I have to be very careful that my Air doesn't slide out of the case when I'm using it. And it's gorgeous. And it's far too expensive. And it's gorgeous. Rats.
customer_reviews.author: Anahita

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit MB Pro retina 13"
customer_reviews.text: It is advertised as to fit the MBP retina 13", but it is too big for it. It's nicel built, leather, and looks super nice, but for the price, one should get at least the appropriate measures.
customer_reviews.author: ManB

customer_reviews.title: Just Right
customer_reviews.text: The feel and the look of this case are wonderful. I rarely use the zipper, as I usually close the MacBook Air and carry it in my backpack, so I do the same with the case as I did without; therefore, I can't complain about the zipper as others have. I've incurred one scratch to the case, which adds to the antique look (and clearly saved my laptop). Occasionally, the little elastic tabs that hold the cover in place come off, but in my experience this has been due to me opening the case upside down (i.e., user-error). Otherwise, the elastic tabs work just fine. So if like me you use a backpack, I highly recommend this case.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Hillary B, Ph.D.

customer_reviews.title: aesthetically pleasing and durable laptop case (with one minor hiccup)
customer_reviews.text: I've gotten many compliments on the aesthetics of this item. It looks and feels like a leather book! I also fee that if I ever fell while cycling with it in my bag, it would protect my 13" macbook pro like a boss. The only issue I have (and the reason for the four stars) with it is that the straps that are supposed to hold it to the flap always fall off my 13" macbook pro. I made sure to check before purchasing whether or not this product fits my laptop and indeed it specified so. Seems like maybe a design flaw? Would anyone from Twelve South like to chime in on this one?
customer_reviews.author: SDK

customer_reviews.title: So much cooler than the wetsuit look
customer_reviews.text: So much cooler than the wetsuit look you see on most MacBooks. It is rigid for protection, but still the leather is soft in your hands. A bit bulky when you think about how sleek the MacBook is, but still thinner than that old laptop. One draw back is there seems to be minor interference with the wi-fi. Once it connects, there is no problem. Its just that it seems to search for the network more now that it is in the bookbook. That did not happen previously.
customer_reviews.author: JKM

customer_reviews.title: Was perfect, but is less than perfect after six months.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. It is beautiful leather and the dimensions fit my 13 inch MacBook Air perfectly. Have had many compliments on it and so far it is serving its purpose well. UPDATE: One of the top straps broke, which makes the case much less effective, but still usable. The leather scratches quite easily, but I guess that adds to the vintage look. I've tried using balm to shine it back up again, but it doesn't eliminate the scratches. Overall it is still a good product and I will continue to use it, but am disappointed that the strap broke in six months time!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Olsen

customer_reviews.title: Almost great, still love it
customer_reviews.text: I have a BookBook for iPad, iPhone, MacBook Pro, and now MacBook Air. I love them all. My only complaint with this one (for the MacBook Air) is that it is not completely flat when closed. There is a gap between the screen and case when shut, making the case look a little larger than it is. I think this will be fixed after 6 months or so of constant use and the leather might loosen up.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: People love my case
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty cool case. The original laptop supports where thin so I replaced them with bra straps sewn in by hand.
customer_reviews.author: Glad Hatter

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, but won’t last as long as your laptop.
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this case -- this is the third book book cover I’ve owned (for an iPad, an iPad mini and a MacBook). Unfortunately, the elastic that holds the top of the device in has a very short life span -- it stretches out and renders the case useless. With the short life span of computers and devices these days, you’d think a case at this cost would outlast the device it’s meant to protect.
customer_reviews.author: Jaye McLaughlin

customer_reviews.title: Cool look for a Librarian
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my Librarian wife. It definitely matches her persona and she gets a kick from it. Pro's: Great look. Great leather. High quality. Easy to use. Con: Not a real firm attachment for the computer within the case. The two straps do an adequate job holding the top/screen in place, but there is no attachment for the bottom/main body of the computer. So far, the computer has not slipped out of the case, and it might never. The design, however, certainly makes one feel that it might at any time. Despite this, I would definitely buy it again and recommend others to do so.
customer_reviews.author: mayhemxpc

customer_reviews.title: Love the look and the protection this case gives.
customer_reviews.text: Yes, I'm a nerd at heart. This is the perfect case for my 13" MBA. It's a great feel and it protects my investment. As another reviewer also said, I was surprised that I can just leave it in the case and open it up to use it. I can charge it in the case as well. All in all a great case. I'd buy it again and again. Oh, some reviewer noticed a smell to the leather. I didn't have that at all. Nothing noticed there, just a perfect. functional case with a good sense of style.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny B. Good

customer_reviews.title: So durable, eco friendly, so cool looking even after worn in
customer_reviews.text: Best cover. Lasts a long time (I've bought 3 of these in the past few years for different macs + ipads). Zippers NEVER broke. So durable. Great quality. Keep the same formula and quality and I will be a Twelve South customer forever!
customer_reviews.author: Queen fLee

customer_reviews.title: Love this cover but.....
customer_reviews.text: This was the second one I bought of the same model, the last being in August 2017. Both of them had zippers that gave up too fast. The latest one also showed evidence the material at one corner was starting to break down. I am the only user of this laptop and have not put it under any sort of duress. I get a lot of compliments on it but, for the price, I just don't know if I am planning to purchase a third.
customer_reviews.author: Blair Heald

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: This case was a gift and it was perfect. This is the nicest laptop cover i've ever had my hands on. When I opened the box I could smell leather, to my surprise its made out of real leather and as far as i'm concerned the only case worthy of the macbook laptops. The zipper is easy to operate and it definitely is a unique case. It's even hand made which I didn't know when I bought it. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: dodge25

customer_reviews.title: so it's nice to have something that doesn't distract from my game
customer_reviews.text: I do tabletop gaming from my MacBook, so it's nice to have something that doesn't distract from my game. It's also nice to zip up my MacBook and put it on my shelf when I'm not using it; it makes me smile. I do wish that it had straps on both sides of the case; they're only on one side.
customer_reviews.author: Shayulghul

customer_reviews.title: Protection and Style
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to purchase this case at first upon reading some reviewers remarks that the elastic bands on the inside that keep the top part of the screen in place are flimsy and the zipper weak- I have found neither of those claims to be true. On an added note I've taken the liberty of adding elastic straps to the bottom as well which has turned this into a super case. It gets compliments everywhere I go and I can rest assured my over priced macbook air is safe in it.
customer_reviews.author: N. Jones

customer_reviews.title: This is the best case ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the best case ever! Holds my macbook air perfectly and is secure by the little bands. It means that I never have to take out my laptop - even as I run around all day in meetings. Haven't dropped the case yet (and hope I never have to). I get a ton of compliments on this case. One other benefit is that because the leather is supposed to look "aged", any liquid or miscellaneous stains blend in.
customer_reviews.author: Helen FangTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: This is definitely one of the best purchases I've ever made
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely adore! This is definitely one of the best purchases I've ever made. I'm an archivist in graduate school for library and information science and I can't even count how many compliments I get on this product. (I know of at least two others who have bought them since they saw mine). Beautifully made - only downside are the very few times I've not been able to find my computer because it looks like a book.. haha (worth that.)
customer_reviews.author: avdescam

customer_reviews.title: Another Great Twelve South Product!
customer_reviews.text: Great item! I have owned several Twelve South BookBook items for my Apple products. They look great and offer great protection. This was no exception. My Macbook fits in it well and I am able to leave it in the case while using it. Easy access to the ports so it can be charged while still in the case.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley Iverson

customer_reviews.title: Great look but a little big for my MacPro
customer_reviews.text: This is such a cool case for my MacPro, Pro's -it is great looking, cool and unique -it disguises the Mac -I first ordered it and wanted to return it because it is too big, they sent me another one for free, but this is the same one, not a smaller size. Con's -it's heavy leather, the fact that you want a light computer to carry around is meaningless with this one. -it is also 2 inches bigger on the edges -it has slips on the top corner of the monitor, it doesn't even catch the corners, so they are useless
customer_reviews.author: Zuleyha Colak

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great feel to the leather and it really does look like a book when closed. It does add weight and thickness to the MBA - with the case it's about the thickness of a MacBook Pro- and there are certainly sleeker options out there, but none can match the class, quality and old world style of the BookBook. If thinness and weight are crucial to you look elsewhere. Update: After some months of use, my only gripe is I wish it secured better to the laptop; there are only two elastic diagonal straps and sometimes the cover comes loose when I move around.
customer_reviews.author: Kinsykins

customer_reviews.title: Good News Everybody
customer_reviews.text: Excellent build quality, looks great, exactly what I expected from Twelve South! I also have the BookBook's for accessories and the iPhone 5, so I pretty much already knew what to expect. What I am really excited about though was that I did not buy this for use with a MacBook Air, but a Lenovo Yoga 2 Pro, and it fits great! It is very snug, another 5mm on the sides and it would be perfect, but it fits none the less. I travel a lot and I can tell this case is going to keep my investment safe for a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Earle

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Got it for use in the Philippines where I have to be careful of snatchers. it fools everyone. Here in the U.S., people love it when they see it. Only negative thing is I feel it's WAY overpriced, even though its made well.
customer_reviews.author: Delirious

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous case works with Lenovo Yoga 2 Pro as well!!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love love this case. It's so beautiful and distinctive. Great quality and works beautifully. Actually bought this to protect my Lenovo Yoga 2 Pro. Hope you're not offended that I'm using this cover for something other than a macbook. Well, I didn't want a macbook and I DID want this case. It fits perfectly. It is snug, I have to make sure the computer is placed just right and tight in there before getting zipper all the way up, but it's just lovely. Just wanted to let anyone who is considering covering their Lenovo with this that it DOES work!
customer_reviews.author: krislyn

customer_reviews.title: I Love the look and feel of this "book" It is ...
customer_reviews.text: I Love the look and feel of this "book" It is very fine quality and really does look just like a beautiful old book, my MacBook pro fits perfectly and I am excited that when I go home today there will be a new one for my IPAD mini as well. I just love the way they look like an old journal.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Lawlor

customer_reviews.title: My favorite Mac case, hands-down!
customer_reviews.text: This is my fourth Twelve South product... love 'em! Be ready to have everyone ask you about your cool case. Everyone will, promise!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: For Late 2013 Macbook pro 13 retina models - Case is too big.
customer_reviews.text: I got this package earlier then expected and I was excited to put my late 2013 macboo pro 13 inch retina , in it, upon finding that this particular case is too big for the late 2013 models It was kinda disappointing. I hope Twelvesouth/Amazon , clarifies this on their product description page. Also if they can tell all the customers who were in this situation. Overall the product quality is excellent , it does kinda look like old book and is quite impressive. Too bad I have to wait for the right case size and re order it.
customer_reviews.author: sumit bhagchandani

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a case for my MacBook Air 13-Inch and read several reviews on this cover. I decided to order it. After I opened the package and placed the notebook inside I can't get over how cool it looks. Yes, the price is steep but the leather is very high quality. I enjoy using my MacBook so much more with this cover. The 'con' if there is one, is that the bottom isn't held into place by any straps. But still no big deal. If you are looking for a cover that is functional so you can place your MacBook into your computer bag I would recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Timmy P.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This case is so unusually, I love it. It really looks like a book when I put it on my bookcase, and I just love the style and the smell. It reminds me of the days when there were books everywhere, not iPads <g>. It has good protection for my Mac Air, and I really love the look of it. It is one of those cases that when you hold it, you have to smile. :)
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Oceanfront

customer_reviews.title: I've never gotten so many compliments on a case
customer_reviews.text: This is a pricey case but I've never had so many people comment on it (in a positive way). I left this at my school's library over a whole weekend and my laptop wasn't stolen - when I called, I told them I was missing a laptop in a cover that looked like a book, and not even the people who worked there found it at first, and had placed it on a bookshelf! So it basically saved me from losing my laptop from a theft, and that's worth the price I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Helen Jiang

customer_reviews.title: Nice case, but does not exactly match the picture
customer_reviews.text: I like the case but have to describe it as differing from the picture. The edges are more rounded and the case is more distressed than I understood from the pictures. It does fit my MacBook perfectly and provides enough protection I am comfortable stuffing it into an unpadded case. It is also nice to have something uncommon - no problems telling which case is mine.
customer_reviews.author: Richmond Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I get so many compliments on this! It is durable and stylish. It fits the older MacBooks.
customer_reviews.author: -Arwen

customer_reviews.title: Amazing case
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful leather case, looks worn, and looks even more so every day adding to its epicness, and adds nice protection for my Air, with the comfy padding inside. Has space under the mac to place my papers and stuff so got rid of my backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I was actually going to return this because I found a cheaper version. When I got it though I loved it and kept it. I like that it's not made cheaply. The zippers are hearty and it looks really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful & Vintage & Cool...LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: My Mac Book Air 13" 2016 (or Latest Edition) fit perfectly. It also fit snugly into my laptop bag. The suede lined interior also offers a nice cushion. Looks so vintage and cool and different. :))))
customer_reviews.author: Babatunde Oyefesobi

customer_reviews.title: Great idea, but...
customer_reviews.text: I think the bookbook is a great idea. It's a bit to heavy for me. If I wanted the extra weight I would not have gotten a Macbook Air. With that being said, even if you have the Mac Air and primarily use it at home or office (not a lot of carrying around), in my opinion, you will really like this product. Not cheap for a cover (approx 10% the cost of a base Macbook or Macbook Air), but it will be a no brainer purchase for many. I opted for a folio style cover and love it!
customer_reviews.author: Markee A. Foster

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL. LOVE IT. WORTH EVERY DOLLAR
customer_reviews.text: BEAUTIFUL. LOVE IT. WORTH EVERY DOLLAR. Fits great in my Lenovo Yoga 13in. Beautiful. very well made. Great protection for my thin laptop. Love it!!! It does add a little weight to my pc, but looks great and noone thinks I have a computer in there. A great buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: "Wizards Magic book"
customer_reviews.text: That is what my son's teacher refers to it - the "Wizard's Magic book" - looks so big and ancient. One adaption: added a velcro sticker under my computers keyboard to the book - I was afraid if the "book" isn't totally upright, or held upside down without being zippered, it would just slip out - so, I added the velcro - all is good. :)
customer_reviews.author: AwesomeBlossom

customer_reviews.title: Easily the best case for your MacBook.
customer_reviews.text: This is easily the best MacBook case around! It thoroughly covers and protects my laptop from dust, scratches, and light spills. The fact that it zips up makes it easy to carry and the binding provides a solid grip. It's a solid cover to protect your investment. But the best part is all the looks and compliments I get on the case! It's a unique item and every time I go into a meeting, everyone always notices the cover as they usually mistake it for a book. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: karmapolice13

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT! perfect protector for laptop
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT! perfect protector for laptop. Everyone thinks I'm carrying a real book. It's very well made Will hold up along time. So easy to carry around and totally protects laptop from falling out because it zips closed and the cover is so thick. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: keno

customer_reviews.title: It makes your Macbook Air more AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: I'm writing this review because of the mass amount of compliments I received while using this case. It's very stylish. The only downfall is the band that holds on top of the screen (very irritating) and also this band is the only thing that secures your Macbook Air to the case, so just be aware. Other than that I'm still happy with the purchase and glad to recommend it everyone else.
customer_reviews.author: ModtechFrenzy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for the money, very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived relatively early, before its estimated arrival time. Although I do not own a MacBook Air, for which this case is designated, I find it absolutely wonderful for protecting my 13-inch Toshiba Ultrabook. The leather is of high quality and the overall look of the case is impressive. I have received many compliments ever since I started using it in public places. When the case is closed with the laptop inside, it looks just like an old, large antique book, which is a great anti-theft plus. I would recommend this product to anybody who has a soft spot for medieval-looking, vintage-styled objects without compromising on the quality of his or her personal belongings.
customer_reviews.author: L.S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great. Everyone really thinks it is an old vintage book on the table. Nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: Rohappy

customer_reviews.title: Great Case
customer_reviews.text: I do really like this case, but it is too big for my MacAir and I'm trying to figure out how to use it as a stand and it will hold up the MacAir. I got a lot of compliments on it and it holds my mac and my iPad just fine. Really cute case.
customer_reviews.author: Suzy Q

customer_reviews.title: I love this case
customer_reviews.text: I love this case! Every time I take it, I get compliments. People think is actually a book until they see me on the computer. It does add weight to my MacBook, but not too much for me to handle. I highly recommend this cover. I have a regular skin on my MacBook and the cover still fits well over it.
customer_reviews.author: G. Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Not bad but not great
customer_reviews.text: Its a nice case for it, but the fit is not perfect for the 13" Macbook Air. Mine has a lot of space left at the top and bottom. Other than that it is a good and solid case that has a lot of style to it.
customer_reviews.author: Faceoff4

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: ABSOLUTELY GORGEOUS, but it was too big for my 13", even though they said it would fit.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit well
customer_reviews.text: Love the case and quality is good, but the elastic bands that are meant to hold the edges of the screen barely reach the top of the screen. Or should I say, the computer sits too low. There is a good inch from the edge of the screen to the case edge. The bands just miss the mark. I'm considering returning.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Cope

customer_reviews.title: Well Made, Good Looking Laptop Cover,
customer_reviews.text: Is as believable to be a book (and not your solid G $ laptop/device) depending on the place being used & wether or not an oversize, leather bound book would seem to fit in or stick out too much. Looks great, put in between a lot of books on a shelf for sure though, so perhaps a great faux anti theft cover if you got a home study or big bookshelf anywhere. Only thing keeping the last star, is that my 13 inch retina mbp 2013 edition is just a little bit too short to fit snug-enough to claim that the back cover of the case never needs re adjusting and laptop repositioning to make sure it stays on snug.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: I loved the product but the zipper popped off and I'm ...
customer_reviews.text: I loved the product but the zipper popped off and I'm afraid the other one will also. The one zipper that is left I'm scared to zip all the way because it may come off track as well. At that point I will have wasted seventy something dollars. I'm very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable, looks good
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this case and use it for travel and to store the laptop. It is slightly bulkier than some but not so much that I would close a different one. Have had it for about a year now and it is holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: krc

customer_reviews.title: Love this case
customer_reviews.text: This case is fabulous. We have it on our Mac book air and we are constantly getting compliments. The look and feel of it is great. It is constructed very well of nice materials. It protects the Mac great. It zips up very easily for additional protection. I would definitely recommend this, it is awesome!!
customer_reviews.author: GKingdom

customer_reviews.title: Overall great product
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this purchase. Beautiful leather, solid design. Well structured so I feel that my MacBook Air is snug and protected when I travel, but surprisingly not bulky, so it doesn't dwarf the laptop and its slim design. Only downfalls I've noticed are that when laptop is closed, the zips must be pulled at a certain angle or using two hands per zip to get it to move. Unlike other users it doesn't bother me that the bottom of the case isn't secured to the laptop like the top. As I said, only one con, the rest is all pro this case, loooove it and wouldn't swap it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Cheftel

customer_reviews.title: GREAT LOOKS  AND PROTECTION FOR YOU LAPTOP
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for about 5 years now it's still is in good shape. I get compliments all the time .... maybe you should not buy it as people will see them everywhere....ha The leather is not ripped or torn. I'm very careful with it and my Mac. Stitching is solid as is the zipper and hinge. Buy it you will like it.
customer_reviews.author: Mak

customer_reviews.title: Excellent case.  No complaints from me.  Compliments from others.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic case. Computer fits exactly as it said it would. Didn't expect so many compliments from friends, strangers and co-workers. No joke. I just liked the look of it being a book and it does a solid job of being a protective carrying case. I highly recommend it if this is the kind of case you are looking for.
customer_reviews.author: CRiggs

customer_reviews.text: It doesnt fit the newest Mac Pro laptops as they are smaller than the Mac Air... with minor adjustments its workable...I LOVE THE LOOK!
customer_reviews.author: Pamula

customer_reviews.title: Wow.
customer_reviews.text: I was kind of skeptical at first of this product because of the price and some of the reviews. i bought it anyway and i love it. it looks like a beautiful old book, and it protects my macbook air 13" like a charm. worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: I love it, but you can't charge the laptop inside the cover
customer_reviews.text: Great cover, gets you complements every time. One zipper makes it not possible to plug the charger while the cover is closed, so you have to open it to charge your MBA, could have been solved by putting 2 zippers, unless I have an old model.
customer_reviews.author: jazzbox

customer_reviews.title: Security through Camoflage
customer_reviews.text: It's great not having to worry about anyone stealing my computer, now that it looks like a musty old ledger! Everyone expresses surprise when I first unzip it to reveal a Mac. Practical, attractive, and a great conversation-starter. Expensive but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Berno

customer_reviews.title: Pleased =)
customer_reviews.text: I have no complaints =) It does add a bit of weight to the overall laptop, but it's stylish and the protection it provides is worth it. Also it is easy to slip my Mac out of this case when I want to embrace its beauty. So much better than that clip-on case that is annoying to remove.
customer_reviews.author: Lily White

customer_reviews.title: Makes my macbook air super heavy. The macbook does not stay in place ...
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed! Makes my macbook air super heavy. The macbook does not stay in place with the tiny straps either! Constantly falling out. The only reason I bought this was to keep my laptop hidden from thieves. Really feel like I made a bad choice!
customer_reviews.author: Robin Leone

customer_reviews.title: Classy Case. Makes the laptop a little bulky.
customer_reviews.text: Nice case, classy look. I've been wanting this for a long time and I finally got it with my new laptop. It really protects the laptop. Only small issue I feel is that it makes the laptop much bigger while carrying it, as compared to some other cases with fit snug.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonShopper

customer_reviews.title: Great for a book lover!
customer_reviews.text: I bring my laptop with me everywhere and get compliments on this everywhere I go. People think it's so cool and it offers great protection for my laptop. I am an apple lover, but this is so cool I don't even mind covering up the glowing apple logo on the outside.
customer_reviews.author: JessicaCarlton

customer_reviews.title: Really nice cover for my MacBook Air (13").
customer_reviews.text: Have it inside a messenger bag so most times I just keep the book case open and insert the MacBook inside with the top unzipped. Really nice when all I want to take is the Macbook Air. Fits extremely well. Very heavy leather material. Zips up easily.
customer_reviews.author: Braddster

customer_reviews.title: It is a fun unique way to carry your computer
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one! I bought a new computer and I bought a new book. I always get compliments and people ask me where I bought it at least once a week. It is a fun unique way to carry your computer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff. Could be a smidge better.
customer_reviews.text: would give it five stars but fit just isn't there. Always putting the bands that hold the lid back on the lid. Otherwise excellent product from 12south. They do good stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Snowdog

customer_reviews.title: I get a lot of compliments!
customer_reviews.text: I like this case and have gotten a lot of compliments on it. In fact, when I was training at the Apple store of of the employees came up and asked me about it. It fits nice on the MacBook Air and is not conspicuous as a laptop case. It is nice for traveling. I do not keep the case on all the time, only when I travel.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking,sleek,extremely functional, shipped quickly & fair priced. Completely impressed!
customer_reviews.author: smurrffydoll

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The item arrive on time but doesn’t fit the laptop macbook
customer_reviews.author: Edgardo Cosme

customer_reviews.title: problems with the zipper
customer_reviews.text: I really like the product as a whole and as a concept. However I have owned it less than one month and the zipper on one end alread ripped at the seam. I am gentle with this product . I wish they would issue me another one for free.
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Using with MacBook Air 13" and love it. It looks great, most people don't suspect it's a computer though they sometimes wonder why I carry around an old book! I agree with some comments that the device is not secured to the case with anything other than a couple of elastic bands intended to open the screen when you open the case. Just depends on what kind of case you are looking for. This one works for me.
customer_reviews.author: Marshall Turner

customer_reviews.title: Feels nice, looks great, too much attention for me
customer_reviews.text: Just like others have said, not many people are going to think this is a real book. The reason I gave it a 4/5 is because I am constantly worried that I'm going to mess it up when I put it down on a public table or that it'll get a big scratch from rubbing against something in my bag; maybe I should scotchguard it? Also, I've been talking with friends on public when people will walk up to me and interrupt to ask about it. My last complaint is the there should have been elastic on the top and bottom to hold the bottom portion of the laptop more securely in the case.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Y

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to grip when zippered shut. Excellent look and feel. Interior straps could be better.
customer_reviews.text: Great feel and look - great grip on a slippery airmac. I do wish there was more than the two flimsy elastic strips holding the computer inside the case when it's open, but feels very secure when zipped shut.
customer_reviews.author: Out in the country

customer_reviews.title: People think it's a book and are amazed that its a case
customer_reviews.text: I get so many compliments on this. People think it's a book and are amazed that its a case. I am quite popular because of this.
customer_reviews.author: Meg Singer

customer_reviews.title: Two thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: In the event my macbook is coming with me to a destination, I always zip that bad boy away in the bookbook and place it at the bottom of my bookshelf with the other photo albums. It blends in so well you wouldn't ever think twice to look for it :D
customer_reviews.author: R. Little

customer_reviews.title: I love this cover for my Mac
customer_reviews.text: I love this cover for my Mac. I think it's awesome that people ask me what my "old book" is that I'm carrying around!
customer_reviews.author: Robert P

customer_reviews.title: Quality, Amazing Quality! Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I have seen these on Pinterest and finally ordered one as a birthday gift & was absolutely schocked at the level of quality it actually was. We LOVE it! It fits perfectly, looks amazing, only thing that I would change is putting two elastic on the bottom corners to keep it from sliding when you put it at an angle. But other than that, we are enjoying the case. Definitely will be recommending to friends. Thanks Amazon for a great price!
customer_reviews.author: smedlin33

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This case works well as both a distraction for others in class, I can't tell you how many people ask me where I got this case and how many people like it. I secretly want to lie to them because I want to be the only one with it. :) Don't worry, i tell everyone where they can get this awesome case!
customer_reviews.author: Brad Willett

customer_reviews.title: Great Item
customer_reviews.text: I go t this item a while ago, and it truely looks nice and unique, it also is very durable , fits perfectly and does it's jobs. The item arrived quickly and was in a perfect shape, I strongly reccomend it!
customer_reviews.author: f17

customer_reviews.title: unique and cool
customer_reviews.text: A perfect cover/case for traveling. No need to take the computer out of the case and find somewhere to put the case while you do your work. Just unzip, open and get to work! Great quality and protection for your computer.
customer_reviews.author: L. EVANS

customer_reviews.title: great case
customer_reviews.text: I love how this case protects the MacBook from all angles! cute case and all ports are easily accessible with this case on it! Lots of compliments too! Highly recommend and would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: AvidDIY-er

customer_reviews.title: Love this Bookcover
customer_reviews.text: This is the coolest book cover I have ever seen. Fits the Macbook air 13" perfectly and protects as well. I would highly recommend this to all my apple friends.
customer_reviews.author: Tazgodzilla

customer_reviews.title: but I love it anyway
customer_reviews.text: I wish it had a way to more securely fasten the Macbook into the case, but I love it anyway. It's really beautiful, looks great and feels very comfortable to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Great case/cover for MacBook Air 13
customer_reviews.text: Great cover/case!! After looking at so many different kinds of cases for my macbook air 13, this is the one that I kept coming back to. For the money you get great protection and real leather. Much better than the plastic snap on cases that you will pay $50-$60 for. A little more money, you get a great look and better protection.
customer_reviews.author: ImOnEnterprise

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: the string that holds the edge of the laptop broke easily
customer_reviews.author: Babo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome case!!! Have used it since I bought it. Great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Bauer

customer_reviews.title: zipper broke
customer_reviews.text: zipper busted right away and i can't close it it has a great look otherwise
customer_reviews.author: ryan knaeble

customer_reviews.title: Not for new MacBook Pro
customer_reviews.text: The case does not fit the new MacBook Pro as advertised. The straps that hold the top are too high up and thus don't work. Looked great but way to expensive for it not to work.
customer_reviews.author: ajr_truman

product_meta.title: Twelve South BookBook for MacBook | Vintage Leather Book case/Sleeve for 13-inch MacBook Air/Pro
product_meta.description: Designed exclusively for MacBook Air, BookBook is a totally unique case for the thinnest of MacBook's. Weighing as little as 13. 5 ounces with an ultra-thin profile, this handmade, genuine leather case offers heavy duty protection. Two hardback covers, reinforced corners and a tough spine offer solid impact protection. The inside of the case is lined with a velvety soft, chocolate brown, padded interior for added protection.
feature_bullets: Classic hand-crafted genuine leather makes the BookBook a sophisticated carry case for your MacBook
With two hardback book covers and a rigid spine, the BookBook nestles your notebook securely for impact absorbing protection
BookBook has a plush, velvety interior that protects your MacBook while in the case
Tucked inside BookBook, this beautiful case allows you to protect your MacBook while concealing it as a vintage book
Compatible with MacBook Air (13-inch, Late 2010 to mid-2018) and MacBook Pro (13-inch, Mid 2009 – Mid 2012)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars538 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
